entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Snow over southern sections before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
